channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Have I Got News for You
channel.desc: Bill Bailey is host, with guest panellists comedian Daliso Chaponda and journalist Helen Lewis joining team captains Paul Merton and Ian Hislop as they delve into the news.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: This Country
channel.desc: Kerry and Kurtan await the release of their uncle, Steve `Nugget' Nuggins, who they believe was wrongfully imprisoned for `having a laugh'.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: This Country
channel.desc: Unemployment remains high for young people in rural communities, so Kerry and Kurtan attend a talk at the village hall with a business woman who runs what may or may not be a pyramid scheme. Kerry is inspired and starts a career as a door-to-door saleswoman.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Bridge of Lies
channel.desc: Ross Kemp presents the high-stakes quiz, where in this edition, a team of celebrities, featuring Dragons' Den star Sara Davies, TV presenter Tyler West and broadcasters Nikki Fox and Gordon Smart, get together to take on the Bridge of Lies for their chosen charities. One by one, they all face the Bridge, choosing who faces each crossing depending on the question category. Each crossing has 32 potential steps, including 22 truths and ten lies.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Weather for the Week Ahead
channel.desc: Detailed weather forecast.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Joins BBC News
channel.desc: BBC One joins the BBC's rolling news channel for a night of news.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC News
channel.desc: A comprehensive compilation of the latest and the most important news stories, updates and developments from the UK and different parts of the world.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Talking Business
channel.desc: Aaron Heslehurst interacts with experts on various business issues from all over the world and interviews them on the latest innovations in technology.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Newsday
channel.desc: The latest international news from London and Singapore.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Disclosure
channel.desc: Kevin Keane investigates how ready Scotland is to embrace a less environmentally-damaging means of dealing with our rubbish and explores why Scotland's recycling rates are stuck at below 50%.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Newsday
channel.desc: The latest international news from London and Singapore.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: The Security Brief
channel.desc: Former Senior Officer in the British Military Mikey Kay unpacks global conflicts and security threats, offering clear, compelling analysis of the events and decisions shaping today's uncertain world.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Newsday
channel.desc: The latest international news from London and Singapore.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: The Media Show
channel.desc: A global, topical weekly show that lifts the hood on the entertainment and news business. The Media Show explores the companies and personalities who command our attention, and how our perception of the world is shaped by their actions. From the streaming giants who entertain us, to the news outlets and social media platforms that inform and enrage us, The Media Show explains how the industry really works.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC News
channel.desc: A comprehensive compilation of the latest and the most important news stories, updates and developments from the UK and different parts of the world.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Business Today
channel.desc: Bringing the latest business news and up to date informed analysis from London and around the world.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Breakfast
channel.desc: The BBC's Breakfast programme features the latest news, sport, business, weather and other items on a daily basis.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Rip-Off Britain
channel.desc: An investigation of the most shocking scams, including the homeowners who have found their homes targeted by scammers who steal personal information to try and sell their homes from under their feet.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Fraud Squad
channel.desc: Trading Standards uncover a massive illegal puppy farm where animals are being used to make tens of thousands of pounds, not a penny of which is declared to the tax authorities. It all starts when the Trading Standards team in Caerphilly respond to calls from concerned neighbours about the number of dogs being kept in a house.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Crimewatch Caught
channel.desc: How the National Crime Agency bust an international network smuggling people in and out of the UK using a fleet of taxis and lorries. And a determined officer sets off on a Europe-wide chase to arrest a gang of thieves terrorising his community.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Homes Under the Hammer
channel.desc: In Essex, a mother helps her daughter get onto the property ladder. Jacqui is impressed with a huge house in south London, and Martin takes in the scenery in the Welsh valleys.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Bargain Hunt
channel.desc: Christina Trevanion is in Narberth, west Wales, where experts Philip Serrell and Kate Bliss help the teams find potentially profitable items to take to auction in Cardiff. Christina visits one of the oldest institutions in the world, the Royal Mint, to learn the history of how coins are made.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC News at One
channel.desc: The latest national and international news.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC London
channel.desc: News, sport and weather from London.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC News at One
channel.desc: The latest national and international news.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Money for Nothing
channel.desc: When is a trunk not a trunk? Sarah Moore needs to find a way to make a vintage trunk pack a profit, and upholsterer Ollie tries to nurse a dated chair back from the brink.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Escape to the Country
channel.desc: A young couple wants to swap their London flat for something bigger in the East Midlands, where Nicki Chapman opens the front doors to a beautiful selection of homes with lovely gardens. Nicki cannot miss the opportunity to meet another young couple who have already made their escape to develop a luxury leather goods business.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Chloe and Peter are a young couple who have just moved to Godalming in Surrey with their dog. However, their new garden is a neglected, overgrown mess that has a strict tree preservation order on four of the trees.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Bridge of Lies
channel.desc: Ross Kemp presents the quiz show where a team of four - in this episode, friends Rob, Diane, Glen and Dave - take on the Bridge of Lies. One by one, they all face the Bridge, choosing who faces each crossing depending on the question category. Each crossing has 32 potential steps, including 22 truths and ten lies. They must cross the Bridge by stepping on the truths and avoiding the lies, earning money for each correct answer.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Pointless
channel.desc: Alexander Armstrong is joined by co-host Gok Wan for the brainy quiz where the contestants try to score as few points as possible by plumbing the depths of their general knowledge to come up with the answers no-one else could think of.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC News at Six
channel.desc: The latest national and international news stories from the BBC News team, followed by weather.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC London
channel.desc: News, sport and weather from London.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Our Lives
channel.desc: Following the Donnelly family from County Armagh, thought to be the oldest group of siblings in the world, with a collective age of 1,064 years.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: EastEnders
channel.desc: Phil and Nigel get a visitor, Ian is the target of mischief, and Kojo steps in to help a friend in need.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: EastEnders
channel.desc: Phil attempts to take control, Kat and Stacey join forces on a plan, and Lauren tries to find a solution to a family problem.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Garden Rescue
channel.desc: Helen and Kevin are nearing full retirement and have a garden dominated by a patio, a breeze-block wall and a shed. With a budget of ?4,000, Charlie and Lee have a challenge ahead to craft a coastal oasis despite being a hundred miles from the sea.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: The Great British Sewing Bee
channel.desc: Sara Pascoe returns to the sewing room with 12 new hopefuls for a brand new series of The Great British Sewing Bee. In week one, judges Patrick Grant and Esme Young challenge the sewers to prove their ability to create shape. First up, the Pattern Challenge sees them crafting a tie-front blouse, using gathers to add volume. Next, in the 90-minute Transformation Challenge, circle skirts are reimagined into brand new garments.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC News at Ten
channel.desc: The latest national and international news.

channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: BBC London
channel.desc: News, sport and weather from London.
